response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us due to its unique features, quality, and the time invested in its development. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $10,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your potential as a discerning buyer. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 10000}
